home.name: Christoper John Aranda
home.title: A Passionate Full Stack Developer
home.description:
Passionate about crafting elegant solutions through code.
I believe great technology should solve real problems and make people's lives easier.

about.heading: About Me
about.description: My journey as a Full Stack Developer has been driven by curiosity and a genuine love for problem-solving through code. I'm passionate about creating web applications that not only work well technically, but also make a real difference in people's daily lives. Whether it's building e-commerce platforms, mobile applications, or complex systems, I approach each project with the mindset that great technology should be both powerful and human-centered. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and continuously learning to stay ahead in this ever-evolving field.

kpk.title: Junior Programmer
kpk.description: Developing and maintaining web applications using React and Node.js
kpk.achievement1: Developed a nationwide corruption trial recording application used across Indonesia
kpk.achievement2: Built full-stack application using modern tech stack: React, Vite, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for frontend
kpk.achievement3: Implemented robust backend system with Laravel and PostgreSQL for handling critical legal data
kpk.achievement4: Collaborated with legal teams to ensure the application meets judicial recording standards and compliance requirements

maro.title: Full Stack Developer
maro.description: Developing and maintaining full-stack web applications using React, Next.js, Expo, and Node.js with a focus on performance and user experience.
maro.achievement1: Optimized web application performance by implementing React and Next.js best practices, resulting in a 40% improvement in loading speed
maro.achievement2: Developed RESTful APIs using Express and MySQL serving over 1000 daily requests
maro.achievement3: Implemented responsive UI/UX using Tailwind CSS and TypeScript, increasing user engagement by 35%

sub.title: Website Developer
sub.description: Developing and maintaining web applications with a focus on front-end development and user interface optimization using modern JavaScript frameworks.
sub.achievement1: Implemented responsive design patterns and optimized code structure, reducing load time by 40%
sub.achievement2: Developed and integrated new features using React.js, leading to a 15% increase in user engagement
sub.achievement3: Actively contributed to team knowledge sharing and documentation, improving development workflow efficiency

1.title: Website for Calculating Water Usage Billing
1.description: A full-stack website for calculating water usage billing and secure payment integration.

2.title: Restaurant Landing Page
2.description: A landing page for a restaurant with a menu and orders system.

3.title: Company Profile Website
3.description: A website for a company to showcase their services and products.

4.title: Corruption Trial Recording Application
4.description: A nationwide web application for recording and managing corruption trial proceedings across Indonesia, developed for the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK).

5.title: Franchise POS System
5.description: A comprehensive Point of Sale (POS) mobile application designed for franchise cashiers, featuring inventory management, sales tracking, and real-time reporting capabilities.
